title: You know what sucks?
body: When you have a bit of a chuckle at the people that placed into bronze five after wining a ton of their games, because they were bronze 3/4 last season,but then you have an average provisionals and get placed in b1 from gold :c FeelsBadMan, i thought that climbing in preseason mattered?

replies.body: if you were gold last season, than you should be at least mechanically better than those in bronze, so the climb shouldnt be difficult.
I understand that, its just disheartening, especially from support.
Support mains are parasites who leech off of their teammates hard work, their ranks have no value.

Keep telling yourself that, mate.

Whatever helps you sleep at night.
Pre-season for me was the best climbed from bronze 4 to silver 3 realized no reward and rank got reset ;(. But I was gifted with a 7/10 i pre-season and got placed in silver 3

the only reason Riot tells you preseason matters is because they don't want everyone trolling the whole time.

Don't get me wrong, preseason does matter, but only like 10% as much as the regular season.
that wold have been nice to know while i climbed to gold for no reason
